page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT IN MAWNAN
page.content: There is quite a large{movement}of young families into the area 10% of the pupils have one parent who came from Mawnan. There are a wide range of {occupations},builders,engineers, electicians and farmers being the most numerous. The building trade has decreased rapidly in the last few years as there is hardly any new houses being built. Most people work out side the area. In the summer there are more jobs available in hotels, in fishing etc. There is a little {unemployment}a few schools leavers have been unable to get jobs. Most families own a{car},mainly the old use the puplic transport and the under 17's.In school 1\% of families have no car, 2\% no T.V and 4 % no telephone. 35% of people said that a {community centre}was needed 32% mainly older people said no.
